description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Principle Accountabilities:
              
              -	Responsible for monthly and weekly production plan, ensure finished goods stock availability at all warehouses.
              

              Job Responsibilities:
              

              -	Manage category end to end supply chain, including:
              
              o	Prepares monthly and weekly production schedules for use by all related departments to meet sales requirements and inventory target
              
              o	Prepare weekly and daily stock transfer plan between warehouses
              
              o	Maintain master data
              
              -	Participates in discussions for preparing product launch and promotion programs and plans proper production volumes and timing.
              
              -	Coordinates with Engineering and Production departments in planning efficient production batches and production cycles.
              
              -	Reports stock situation weekly and daily.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              •	Bachelor degree of Economic / Industrial Engineering or related
              
              •	At least 3 year working experience in Supply Chain/ Production Planning position
              
              •	Strong knowledge of production planning and stock management
              
              •	Strong communication and collaboration skills
              
              •	Proactive and be able to work under pressure
